resources.string: Q1 : Japan is called \"Nippon\" in Japanese.
Q3 : Main island of Japan is called \"Kanto\".
Q4 : Japanese company which owns the product "Hello Kitty" is \"Sanrio\".
Q5 : The highest mountain in Japana is \"Mt.Fuji\".
Q6 : Osaka used to be the capital of Japan.
Q7 : A prefecture which is located in the most southern edge of Japan is Okinawa.
Q8 : Tokyo is supposed to have the Olympics in 2020.
Q9 : \"Tsukiji\" is well known as the place which has a big vegetable market.
Q10 : \"Itadakimasu\" is a word that Japanese people say after a meal.
